title: EUNE SERVER CRASHED I DID NOT GET LOSS PREVENTED
body: so me and my frend were playing a duo game and we both got 500 ms and attempting to recconect even tho we had net(we are on diffrent net providers) and most of the team was dcing all game but we did not get loss prevented RIOT PLEASE fix this server http://prntscr.com/fpsur5

replies.body: [**Loss Prevention**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014) is a system that will only activate on server-wide or system-wide shutdowns that aren't planned. Essentially, it only happens when something goes *majorly* wrong across the board and a huge number of players were affected.
